acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused is absent without any steps. Issue NBWA against the accused. Criminal Assistant is to take steps.
Accused is absent without any steps. NBWA issued against the accused is not returned. Issue reminder to the O/C of concerned Police Station to return the WA after immediate execution.

Accused is absent without any steps. NBWA issued against the accused is returned with report that accused has been absconding evading police arrest. Issue NBWA and PandA against the accused. Criminal assistant to take steps.

Case was posted for production of accused under arrest/report. PandA issued against the accused is returned with report. Accused has surrendered before the Court and filed Pt. No. 1287/2019 praying to allow him to go on bail. Heard the Ld. Counsels for both sides. Bail prayer is rejected as the accused was absconder. Accused is remanded to the judicial custody till 12.09.2019. Re-call the NBWA pending in the police station. Case is listed for furnishing copy.                      Fix 12.09.2019 for production of accused and furnishing copy.

Case was posted for production of accused and for furnishing copy. Accused is produced from the judicial custody. Copy is ready and furnished to the accused. Accused is remanded to the judl. Custody till next date.                       Fix   26.09.2019 for production of accused and  hearing on consideration of charge.

Case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Accused is present. Witnesses not present. Issue fresh summons to the witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                       Fix 02.01.2020 for evidence of prosecution side.

Case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Accused is present. Witnesses not present. Issue fresh summons to the witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                       Fix 24.02.2020 for evidence of prosecution side.

Case record put up before me as the PO is on leave. Case was posted for evidence of prosecution side. Accused is present. PWs Kabita Rajbongshi and Sambhu Rajbongshi are present. Hearing is adjourned. Presentee witnesses are asked to go on PR bond of Rs. 100/- each. Issue summons to the remaining witnesses. Prosecution to take steps.                       Fix 09.04.2020 for evidence of prosecution side.
